title: Thursday critiques over the next two weeks
content:
I have enjoyed the critiques ove the last two Thursdays. But I will be going on vacation this week, and will be away for the next two Thursdays (It wouldn’t be a vacation if I had computer and internet access, now would it ;-) ).

author: dan_reynolds
